name: Greater Earth Elemental
flavor: A living landslide of boulders and dust, as large as a house.

features.name: Slow - Passive
features.desc: When you spotlight the Elemental and they don’t have a token on their stat block, they can’t act yet. Place a token on their stat block and describe what they’re preparing to do. When you spotlight the Elemental and they have a token on their stat block, clear the token and they can act.

features.name: Crushing Blows - Passive
features.desc: When the Elemental makes a successful attack, the target must mark an Armor Slot without receiving its benefits (they can still use armor to reduce the damage). If they can’t mark an Armor Slot, they must mark an additional HP.

features.name: Immovable Object - Passive
features.desc: An attack that would move the Elemental moves them two fewer ranges (for example, Far becomes Very Close). When the Elemental takes physical damage, reduce it by 7.

features.name: Rockslide - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to create a rockslide that buries all the land in front of Elemental within Close range with rockfall. All targets in this area must make an Agility Reaction Roll (19). Targets who fail take 2d12+5 physical damage and become Vulnerable until their next roll with Hope. Targets who succeed take half damage.

features.name: Momentum - Reaction
features.desc: When the Elemental makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.
